Package main

Class GameEnvironment

java.lang.Object
main.GameEnvironment
public class GameEnvironment extends Object
Game Environment which is the core of this program

  • Constructor Details

    • GameEnvironment

      public GameEnvironment(UserInterface userInterface)
      Start new game by setting up Team name, number of weeks for season and difficulty of game
      Parameters:
      userInterface - userInterface that player currently use to interact with this system

  • Method Details

    • set

      public void set(String name, int week, DifficultyOption difficulty)
      method for initial setup at the beginning of this program to play
      Parameters:
      name - player's Team name
      week - total week that player wants to play
      difficulty - difficulty of this program(game) that player wants to play

    • getTeam

      public Team getTeam()
      get Player's team. Create new Team if this.team == null
      Returns:
      player's team

    • getMarket

      public Market getMarket()
      get entire market system / information
      Returns:
      market data of each week

    • getDifficulty

      public DifficultyOption getDifficulty()
      get player's difficulty data/information
      Returns:
      entire difficulty data as enum class

    • getCurrentSeason

      public int getCurrentSeason()
      get week info that player is currently on
      Returns:
      integer value about players current week

    • getTotalSeason

      public int getTotalSeason()
      get total week of season player select at the beginning setup
      Returns:
      int value about players total week of season

    • start

      public void start()
      call setup method in this.ui

    • tradingProcess

      public void tradingProcess(String type, Product[] stockType, int col) throws RuntimeException
      processing method about trading method
      Parameters:
      type - String value indicating whether it is a buy or sell status
      stockType - A value indicating whether the product players want to buy is an athlete or an item.
      col - the stock's index in Market Team Roster or Team inventory.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Throws No Space Exception Empty slot Exception

    • useItem

      public void useItem(int athleteIndex, int itemIndex)
      method to lead system to use item to athletes
      Parameters:
      athleteIndex - Player team's athletes index in roster
      itemIndex - Player team's item index in inventory

    • check

      public void check(String input, String REGEX, String message) throws IllegalInputException
      call checkRegex method form class SetUp
      Parameters:
      input - user's input
      REGEX - regular expression to check input's requirement
      message - String for error message
      Throws:
      IllegalInputException - throw this exception if input did not follow its requirement

    • swap

      public void swap(int athlete1, int athlete2)
      method that lead to swapAthletes method in class Team to swap two athletes
      Parameters:
      athlete1 - athlete's index user wants to swap
      athlete2 - athlete's index user wants to swap

    • isGame

      public boolean isGame()
      method to get result about the match is all done by its condition
      Returns:
      boolean value about match is game

    • isSet

      public boolean isSet()
      method to get result about each set of match is finish
      Returns:
      boolean value about the game is set

    • isPlayable

      public void isPlayable() throws InsufficientAthleteException
      check player's team is qualify to have match
      Throws:
      InsufficientAthleteException - occurs when injured athlete is in regular position or team does not have enough athletes to play

    • isPlayed

      public boolean isPlayed()
      method to check if player played at least once per each week
      Returns:
      boolean value and value is true if player played match at lest once

    • getOpponent

      public Team getOpponent()
      get opponent team information from GameManager
      Returns:
      opponent team that player play against with

    • getAdjustedStats

      public int[][] getAdjustedStats()
      A method that connects a player to a method that can return the range of offensive and defensive stat corrections that an athlete's can receive during the game.
      Returns:
      integer values about athletes' range of offensive and defensive stat corrections in 2D array

    • buffOffensive

      public void buffOffensive()
      method to lead system to adjusting athletes stats range during game this method will introduce how athletes' offense stats will be buffed and how athlete's defense stats will be nerfed

    • buffDefensive

      public void buffDefensive()
      method to lead system to adjusting athletes stats range during game this method will introduce how athletes' defense stats will be buffed and how athlete's offense stats will be nerfed

    • battleSequences

      public void battleSequences()
      call actual battle sequence

    • getBattleMessage

      public String getBattleMessage()
      get message about each fight result
      Returns:
      String value about fighting result about each fight

    • getGameSetNumber

      public int getGameSetNumber()
      get match set number
      Returns:
      integer value about current set of the match

    • matchResult

      public int[] matchResult()
      get player's and opponent's game score from gameManager
      Returns:
      integer values about player's game score and opponents' game score in integer array

    • getPlayerOverall

      public int[] getPlayerOverall()
      give information that is about match result to UserInterface
      Returns:
      integer values about player's number of win and player's total played in integer array

    • closingGame

      public void closingGame(double money, boolean lose)
      reduce athlete stamina
      Parameters:
      money - money that player earned after match
      lose - value should be true if player lose the game.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      reset market status and match list when user take a bye

      public boolean randomLeaveEvent()

      Returns:
      arraylist with added players where the event occurred

      Returns:
